title: Frequent FPSdrops and frequent bug-splat errors
body:
Ever since the most recent patch I have noticed that my FPS drops quite a considerable amount. I usually play and 60 FPS with minor drops of 5-10 but it seems I am now dropping to round 25 FPS in the majority of my games I have also been experiencing more than usual bug-splat errors. Today I had 1 when i was trying load into a RGM, then upon reconnecting it proceeded to do this another 3 times with each time my client doing a full repair. 
Got any advice/help for me? Would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey Crumm,

Sorry for the late reply. If you're still having this problem, try the following in order:

+ Confirm that your resolution settings are the same as before. It's possible things got reset to a high resolution on the new patch. Also check to see if lowering the resolution fixes the problem.


+ I assume you have restarted your PC, but if not, do that now and check to see if the game is working fine again.


+ Download and install the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool). Open it, select _Force Repatch_ and press _Start_. Once the client has re-patched, open up League and see if the issue has been fixed.


If none of that works, then let me know and I'll see what else we might be able to do :)
